Name: Abdul G.
Review text:
Assalam u Alaikum
Received before due date original product,packing was a little poor , but seller is coprative.It was my first purchase on installment happy to get it on 0% Mark up

Name: S***n
Review text: The seller was very cooperative and delivered the phone in just 3 days upon my request. The phone is just perfect and everything what I was looking for.
Same as described.. Amazing Packing and received just in 2 days.. Highly recommend

Name: Sadaqat A.
Review text:
The product was the same as mentioned in the original. 
It was 8GB and 128GB variant mentioned and got the same.
The most beautiful thing is that I got the order delivered in just one day, which was surprised for me.
The expected delivery date was 18 September, but I got my order on 15 September.

Name: M***.
Review text:
Ordered on Friday Afternoon and received on Monday morning. Good packing. Great Phone. Same Specifications as described. Charger 33W and back cover is also in box but no Hand free. 
Don't know about warranty? Bank installment option selected but deducted whole payment, need to sort this with Daraz or Bank?
Overall Good Experience.

Name: Arslan Z.
Review text:
